page.title: 13Farming Continued
page.content: Many fruits and vegetables are grown on Stud Farm and most of these are frozen bottled or stored for winter. PITTONS FARM This farm dates from 1936 and is about 185 acres. As well as growing crops there are also milking cows,calves and beef bulls on the farm.Milking is done in an automatic milking parlour. Besides the farmer,a herdsman and tractor driver work there. The farm has five tractors,a grass harvetor,a mower,a plough,a cultivator and a seed drill. The busiest time of the year is May and June.
